auth.signInToManage: Sign in to manage your choirs and songs
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

home.title: Welcome to AppChoir
home.subtitle: The complete solution for managing your choir, songs, and performances

features.title: Why Choose AppChoir?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your choir in one beautiful platform

choirManagement.title: Choir Management
choirManagement.description: Easily manage your choir members, roles, and permissions. Send invitations and organize your musical community.

songLibrary.title: Song Library
songLibrary.description: Comprehensive song database with ChordPro support. Create choir-specific versions and manage your repertoire.

smartPlaylists.title: Smart Playlists
smartPlaylists.description: Create dynamic playlists for services and events. Use templates and organize songs by sections.

testimonial.text: AppChoir has revolutionized how we manage our choir. The song library and playlist features are incredible!

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Choir?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of choir directors already using AppChoir to manage their musical communities
cta.note: Free to get started â€¢ No credit card required

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Please log in to access your dashboard and manage your choirs.
dashboard.clickToViewAdminChoirs: Click to view choirs you manage
dashboard.clickToViewMemberChoirs: Click to view choirs you're in
dashboard.noChoirsDescription: Create your first choir or wait for an invitation to start.
dashboard.step2: Step 2: Add songs to your library

choir.title: Choir
choir.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to create a choir.

settings.title: Settings
settings.profileDescription: Update your personal information and preferences
settings.notificationDescription: Push notifications are automatically enabled when you allow notifications in your browser. You will receive notifications for:
settings.notificationNote: Note: To manage notifications, use your browser's notification settings.

songs.templateLocked: Template is locked after adding songs to playlist
songs.templateLockedAfterFirstSong: Template cannot be changed after adding the first song
songs.deletePlaylistInfo: Want to start over with a different template? Delete this playlist to unlock template selection.
songs.templateInstructions: Templates help organize your playlist into sections. Choose a template or select 'None' to add songs freely.
songs.templateAlwaysVisible: Select a template to organize your playlist, or choose 'None' to add songs without sections. Default template is used when no selection is made.
songs.templateSelectedInfo: Songs will be organized using the selected template's sections.
songs.tryDifferentKeywords: Try different keywords or clear your search.
songs.noSongsAvailable: No songs are available. Try adjusting your filters or adding new songs.
songs.failedToLoadSongs: Failed to load more songs. Please try again later.
songs.failedToSearchSongs: Failed to search songs. Please try again later.
songs.failedToAddSong: Failed to add song to playlist
songs.notMemberOfChoirs: You are not a member of any choirs yet.
songs.notMemberOfAnyChoirs: You are not a member of any choirs yet.
songs.enterChordPro: Enter your song in ChordPro format
songs.title: Title
songs.confirmRemoveMember: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from the choir?
songs.startBuildingChoir: Start building your choir by inviting members to join.
songs.confirmDeleteSongs: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} song version?
songs.confirmDeleteSongs_plural: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} song versions?
songs.noSongsMatchFilters: No songs match your current filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
songs.noSongsInChoir: There are no song versions in this choir yet. Create your first song version to get started.
songs.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} song version(s)?
songs.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your filters or search terms
songs.getStartedWithSongs: Get started by adding your first song

playlistTemplates.title: Playlist Templates
playlistTemplates.createFirstTemplate: Create your first template to get started
playlistTemplates.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the template "{{title}}"?

globalTemplateDescriptions.generic: A basic template with one section for songs
globalTemplateDescriptions.mass: Traditional Catholic Mass template with liturgical sections

playlists.title: Playlists
playlists.failedToFetchSong: Failed to fetch details for a song.
playlists.virtualPlaylistBanner: This playlist is a preview based on your default template. It will be saved only after you add the first song.
playlists.startBuildingPlaylist: Start building your playlist by adding songs to sections. Use templates or create custom sections to organize your music.
playlists.noSongsInSection: No songs in this section yet.
playlists.sectionAddInstructions: To add songs, go to the Songs tab and add them to your playlist.
playlists.emptyPlaylistMessage: This playlist doesn't have any songs yet. Start building your playlist by adding songs to sections.
playlists.shareDescription: Share this playlist as a PDF with anyone. They don't need the app to view it.
playlists.qrInstructions: Scan this QR code with any device to download the playlist PDF
playlists.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this playlist?

choirAdmin.title: Choir Admin
choirAdmin.manageDescription: Manage your choir members and playlist templates.
choirAdmin.playlistTemplatesDescription: Create and manage reusable playlist templates for your choir services and events.
choirAdmin.manageMembersSubtitle: Manage choir members and their roles
choirAdmin.failedToInviteMember: Failed to invite member. Please try again.
choirAdmin.removeMemberConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
choirAdmin.failedToRemoveMember: Failed to remove member. Please try again.
choirAdmin.failedToUpdateRole: Failed to update member role. Please try again.
choirAdmin.failedToUpdateChoirName: Failed to update choir name. Please try again.
choirAdmin.choirNameTooLong: Choir name must be less than 100 characters
choirAdmin.choirNameExists: A choir with this name already exists
choirAdmin.deleteChoirWarning: Once you delete a choir, there is no going back. This action cannot be undone.
choirAdmin.deleteChoirConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the choir "{{choirName}}"?
choirAdmin.deleteChoirWarning1: Delete all choir playlists and templates
choirAdmin.deleteChoirWarning2: Remove all choir members and invitations
choirAdmin.deleteChoirFinalWarning: This action cannot be undone and all data will be lost forever.
choirAdmin.failedToDeleteChoir: Failed to delete choir. Please try again.

createPlaylist.failedToCreatePlaylist: Failed to create playlist. Please try again.

errors.validationError: Please check your input and try again.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

validation.maxLength: Must be no more than {{max}} characters

onboarding.welcomeSubtitle: Let's get you started with your musical journey
onboarding.chooseHowToUse: Choose how you'd like to use AppChoir:
onboarding.canChangeAnytime: Don't worry - you can always change this later or be invited to join choirs.
onboarding.createAndManage: Those who want to create and manage choirs
onboarding.leadersWhoInvite: Leaders who invite and organize choir members
onboarding.createPlaylistsTemplates: Create playlists and templates for services

onboarding.singersWhoWant: Singers who want to access choir resources

createPlaylistTemplate.title: Create Playlist Template
createPlaylistTemplate.sectionsHelp: Create sections to organize your playlist. Common sections include: Opening, Worship, Offertory, Closing.
createPlaylistTemplate.atLeastOneSection: Template must have at least one section
createPlaylistTemplate.atLeastOneSectionTitle: At least one section with a title is required

authError.defaultMessage: An unknown error occurred during authentication.

tokenError.title: Authentication Token Error
tokenError.description: There was an issue with your authentication token. This usually happens when the login session expires.

networkError.title: Connection Error
networkError.description: Unable to connect to our authentication service.
networkError.suggestion: Please check your internet connection and try again.

cancelledError.title: Authentication Cancelled
cancelledError.description: The authentication process was cancelled or access was denied.
cancelledError.suggestion: You can try signing in again or contact support if this persists.

genericError.title: Authentication Error
genericError.description: Something went wrong during the authentication process.
genericError.suggestion: Please try signing in again or contact support if the problem continues.

editPlaylistTemplate.title: Edit Template
editPlaylistTemplate.sectionsHelp: Create sections to organize your playlist. Common sections include: Opening, Worship, Offertory, Closing.

playlistDetail.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this playlist?
playlistDetail.confirmDeleteMessage: This action cannot be undone. All songs in this playlist will be removed, and you can select a different template for this date.

playlistTemplateDetail.title: Template Details
playlistTemplateDetail.templateNotFoundMessage: The requested template could not be found.
playlistTemplateDetail.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.
playlistTemplateDetail.cannotDeleteDefault: Cannot delete the default template. Please set another template as default first.
playlistTemplateDetail.cannotDeleteDefaultTooltip: Default templates cannot be deleted. Set another template as default to enable deletion.
playlistTemplateDetail.setDefaultConfirm: Are you sure you want to set "{{title}}" as the default template?
playlistTemplateDetail.failedToSetDefault: Failed to set template as default
playlistTemplateDetail.templateExplanation: Templates define the structure for your playlists. Add sections here, then use this template to create playlists with actual songs.
playlistTemplateDetail.noSectionsMessage: This template doesn't have any sections yet.

songVersionEditor.songNotFoundMessage: The requested song could not be found.
songVersionEditor.tips: Tips: Use {C} for chords, [Verse 1] for sections. Press Ctrl+S to save, Ctrl+P to preview.
songVersionEditor.unsavedChangesConfirm: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

choirPlaylistsTab.dateHelp: (Changing the date will show playlists for that date.)

pwa.installDescription: Get quick access and work offline by installing the app on your device.

basicSyntax.title: Basic Syntax
basicSyntax.description: ChordPro is a simple text format that allows you to add chords above lyrics:

metadata.title: Song Title and Metadata

completeExample.title: Complete Example

tips.title: Tips
tips.tip1: Place chords in square brackets [C] directly before the syllable they belong to
tips.tip2: Use curly braces for directives like {title: Song Name}
tips.tip3: Separate verses and choruses with blank lines

invitationsList.invitedToJoin: You have been invited to join

inviteMemberEnhanced.title: Invite New Member
inviteMemberEnhanced.subtitle: Send an invitation to join your choir
inviteMemberEnhanced.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
inviteMemberEnhanced.noteText: The invited user will receive an email with instructions to join your choir. They'll need to create an account if they don't have one.

invitation.title: You're Invited!
invitation.subtitle: You have been invited to join
invitation.notFoundMessage: This invitation does not exist or has expired
invitation.welcomeUser: Hello {name}, would you like to join this choir?
invitation.signInToJoin: To join this choir, you need to sign in or create an account.
invitation.signInNote: By signing in, you will automatically join this choir.
invitation.alreadyMember: You are already a member of this choir
invitation.expired: This invitation has expired or has been deactivated

shareableInvitation.expiresIn24Hours: Invitation links automatically expire after 24 hours.
